ARABIC: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and man will have no strength or helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He will have no strength or helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: he shall have no power, and no helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: he will have no power, nor anyone to help him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So man will neither have any strength nor any aide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then he will have no power, nor any helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He shall have neither strength nor helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and he shall have no strength, no helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then will he have no might nor any helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [man] will have no power, and no helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then he shall have no power nor any helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and he shall have neither power nor helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Man) will have no power, and no helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then will (man) have no power, nor any helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: when he will be helpless, with no supporter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He will have no strength, and no supporter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then man will have no power or any helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [86:10] whereat he, the one who denies resurrection, will have neither strength, to defend himself against chastisement, nor any helper, to avert it from him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then will he) Abu Talib (have no might) to defend himself (nor any helper) to shield him from Allah's chastisement.
